_clearHighlightingHere: Click here to CLEAR HIGHLIGHTS on this page
_contractSignConfirmation: , by clicking the button you will sign the document and your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_contractSignConfirmationSignaturePlaced: , you have signed the document . When you click the button your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_contractsignatorycancelmodaltext: If you reject the document it can’t be signed anymore. Please describe why you want to reject the document.
_contractsignatorycancelmodaltextwithout: If you reject the document it can’t be signed anymore.
_couldNotUpload: Sorry, the file could not be uploaded. Please try again or with a different file.
_elegBankAccessDenied: Internal error. Please try again later.
_elegBankIDRFA12: Internal error. Update your BankID App and try again.
_elegBankIDRFA13: Trying to start your BankID App.
_elegBankIDRFA14: You do not have a BankID that can be used for this signature on this device. If you don’t have a BankID you can order one from your bank. If you have a BankID on another device you can start the BankID App on that device.
_elegBankIDRFA16: The BankID you are trying to use is revoked or too old. Please use another BankID or order a new one from your bank.
_elegBankIDRFA17: The BankID App couldn’t be found on your device. Please install it and order a BankID from your bank. Install the app from install.bankid.com.
_elegBankIDRFA8: The BankID App is not responding. Please check that the BankID App is started and that you have internet access, then try again.
_elegBankIDRFA9: Enter your security code in the BankID App and select Sign.
_elegBankInvalidParametersCanChange: Wrong personal ID number. Change and try again.
_elegBankInvalidParametersCantChange: Wrong personal ID number. Contact the document sender to change.
_elegSignConfirmationText: , you will sign using Swedish BankID. When you have signed your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_elegSignConfirmationTextNoName: You will sign using Swedish BankID. When you have signed your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_legalparagraphBody: This email contains confidential information and should not be forwarded. Disclosure, copying, distribution or other processing of the information contained in this message is prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this in error please notify the sender and delete immediately.
_mailContractClosedContentLinked: The signed document was too large to send to you by email.
_mailContractClosedContentLinkedAccount: The document has been saved to your Scrive account.
_mailContractClosedContentLinkedNoAccoun: It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_mailContractClosedContentSignedBy: The document $documenttitle$ has been signed by $partylist:noescape()$.
_mailDocumentCorrectionBody:
At $closingtime$ the document $documenttitle$ was signed and we sent you a copy of the document.

We have found that there was a technical issue when the document was finalised by our e-signing system. The issue prevented the e-signing system from sealing the document with a digital signature. The issue has been corrected and the document has now been sealed with a digital signature.

Find the document with the new digital signature attached. To avoid future confusion please keep this document and discard the previous version.

If you are interested to learn more about the purpose of digital signatures we recommend this article: $mailDocumentCorrectionBodyWikiURL()$
_mailDocumentLinked: The document was too large to attach to this email. It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_mailInvitationToSignContractDefaultHead: $creatorname$ has invited you to e-sign the document $documenttitle$.
_mailInvitationToSignFollowInstructions: Click the button for further instructions.
_mailInvitationToViewDefaultHeader: $creatorname$ has invited you to review the document $documenttitle$.
_mailRejectMailContentRejected: $rejectorName$ has rejected signing the document $documenttitle$. The signing process has therefore been cancelled by the Scrive system.
_mailRejectMailContentRejected2: Please log in to your account to edit and restart the process.
_pinWillBeSentTo: The PIN will be sent by SMS to
_remindMailNotReviewedContractBody: $authorname$ wants to remind you to review the document $documenttitle$.
_remindMailNotSignedContractBody: $authorname$ wants to remind you to sign the document $documenttitle$.
_remindMailNotSignedContractBodyAutomati: This is an automatic reminder that you haven't signed the document $documenttitle$ from $authorname$ yet.
_remindMailNotSignedContractBodyFurther: Click the button for further instructions.
_remindMailSignedContractStandardHeaderS: You have previously e-signed the document $documenttitle$. $creatorname$ has requested to resend the finalised document to you.
You have previously reviewed the document $documenttitle$. $creatorname$ has requested to resend the finalised document to you.
_sessionTimedoutInSignview: Your session has timed out. You can access your document again by following the link in your email.
_signingErrorMessage1: We're experiencing difficulties handling your document.
_signingInProgressDontCloseWindow: We are still saving your signature. If you leave this page we may not be able to finish the process.
_signingStartedDontCloseWindow: You have not signed the document yet. Do you want to leave without signing?
_signinginprogressmodalYouHaveSignedPlea: You have signed the document . Please wait while Scrive E-sign:
_signviewAttachmentUploadedInOtherWindow: Sorry, we are unable to upload your file because this document is open in another window. Please reload your page to continue.
_signviewSigningFailed: Sorry, something went wrong while signing the document. Please try again.
_smsDocumentErrorAuthor: Scrive could not handle the document $documenttitle:noescape()$ and the signing process has been cancelled. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@scrive.com
_smsDocumentErrorSignatory: Scrive could not handle the document $documenttitle:noescape()$ and the signing process has been cancelled. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@scrive.com
_smsInvitationToSign: $creatorname:noescape()$ has invited you to e-sign the document $documenttitle:noescape()$. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_smsRejectNotification: $rejectorName$ has rejected to sign the document $documenttitle:noescape()$. The signing process has therefore been cancelled. Follow the link to view the document $link$
_smsReminder: $creatorname$ wants to remind you to sign the document $documenttitle:noescape()$. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_smsReminderAutomatic: This is an automatic reminder that you haven't signed the document $documenttitle:noescape()$ from $creatorname$ yet. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_smsReminderSigned: The signed document $documenttitle:noescape()$ has been resent to you at the request of $creatorname$. Find the document by following this link $link$
_unavailableForSign: The document is no longer available for signing
